channel.title: A Few Questions
channel.description:
Question 1: I need to know how to fix when you equip an item and it goes to a different slot. EX. Equip Magic Skill Cape and it goes to the weapon slot instead of the cape slot. (ive tryed adding it to the cape spot in item.java..didn't work.
Question 2: How do i make it where your head doesn't show through the skill cape hoods?

item.description:

the 14087 is the hood, and its still not working >.>[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2008, 06:19:46 PM[/size][hr]anyone? o.O[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2008, 06:25:56 PM[/size][hr]Ive tryed adding it to these:

hat
fullmask

none worked

item.title: A Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

[quote=“d34dly, post:1, topic:171831”]Question 1: I need to know how to fix when you equip an item and it goes to a different slot. EX. Equip Magic Skill Cape and it goes to the weapon slot instead of the cape slot. (ive tryed adding it to the cape spot in item.java…didn’t work.

Question 2: How do i make it where your head doesn’t show through the skill cape hoods?[/quote]
For question 1, go into item.java and youll see like hatequip and whatnot, and then numbers. Add the item id there.

Read full topic
